Summary._: There is limited [A] train service between 168 St and Inwood-207 St in both directions because of a rail condition at 190 St. See mta.info

Description._:
There is limited [A] train service between 168 St and Inwood-207 St in both directions because of a rail condition at 190 St.

As an alternative customers may use [1] train service or M4 or M100 bus service making nearby station stops.

Our crews are on site working to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon.

LongDescription:
There is limited [A] train service between 168 St and Inwood-207 St in both directions because of a rail condition at 190 St. 
As an alternative customers may use [1] train service or M4 or M100 bus service making nearby station stops. 
Our crews are on site working to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon.

Summary._: Southbound [E] and [F] trains are running local from Forest Hills-71 Av to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av because of signal problems at Forest Hills-71 Av.

Description._:
Southbound [E] and [F] trains are running local from Forest Hills-71 Av to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av because of signal problems at Forest Hills-71 Av.

Expect delays in [E], [F], [M] and [R] train service.

LongDescription:
Southbound [E] and [F] trains are running local from Forest Hills-71 Av to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av because of signal problems at Forest Hills-71 Av. 
Expect delays in [E], [F], [M] and [R] train service.

Summary._: [R] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems between 86 St and Bay Ridge-95 St.

Description._:
[R] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems between 86 St and Bay Ridge-95 St.

Our crews are on scene working to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon.

LongDescription:
[R] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems between 86 St and Bay Ridge-95 St.
Our crews are on scene working to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon.
